title: Churchyardes lamentacion of freyndshyp
author: Churchyard, Thomas, 1520?-1604.
publisher: By Thomas Colwell for Nicolas Wyer dwelling in S. Martyus [sic] paryshe nere to Charynge Crosse, at the sygne of Saint Iohn Euangelist,
notes: Signed: qd. Churchyarde, i.e. Thomas Churchyard.
Verse - "In court some say doth freindshyp flowe,".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
